snippet: A Mormon bishop in Los Angeles apologized Sunday for the tone of a blog saying Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid was unworthy to enter the faith's temples, but stood by his criticism of Reid's stands on some issues....

headline.print_headline: Mormon Bishop Apologizes Over Anti-Reid Blog
headline.main: Mormon Bishop Apologizes Over Anti-Reid Blog

lead_paragraph: A Mormon bishop in Los Angeles apologized Sunday for the tone of a blog saying Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid was unworthy to enter the faith's temples, but stood by his criticism of Reid's stands on some issues.
